short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Actually remove watched Youtube videos from the Watch Later playlist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For many people, the "Remove watched" button in Youtube's "Watch later" playlist doesn't work. This extension replaces that button with a workaround.
